title: Robert Jenrick – 2021 Comments on Councils Helping Afghan Refugees
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Robert Jenrick, the Secretary of State for Communities, Housing and Local Government, on 13 September 2021.
content:
I am incredibly impressed by the positive response we’ve received from councils so far, with a large number already pledging their support.
